1.name: Deuces are Wild
1.description: After a flurry of attacks, the Winter Soldier finishes off his opponent with a little help from his friends.

2.description: The Winter Soldier demonstrates a few tricks he learned from his days as Captain America's partner.

3.name: Fist of the Red Army
3.description: The Winter Soldier was once the greatest assassin the Red Army ever produced. Let him show you why.

signature.name: EMP Upgrade
signature.description: Winter Soldier's bionic arm grants him the ability to Power Drain his foes through his Critical Hits.

description: In the heat of World War II, Bucky Barnes gave his life for his country – or so Captain America thought. His frozen body was recovered by the Soviets, who turned him into an unstoppable, fearsome assassin – and their puppet! Freed from Russian control, Bucky now fights on the side of the just and righteous.
